author: Dave Lawler
title: U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson moved to intensive care as coronavirus symptoms worsen
description: U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been taken to the intensive care unit of St. Thomas Hospital in London due to increasingly severe coronavirus symptoms. The backdrop: Johnson was admitted to the hospital on Sunday for what Downing Street called "routine …
content:
U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been taken to the intensive care unit of St. Thomas Hospital in London due to increasingly severe coronavirus symptoms.
